comments: q-integers for q=-6.Let A be the Hessenberg matrix of order n, defined by: A[1,j]=1, A[i,i]:=-5, (i>1), A[i,i-1]=-1, and A[i,j]=0 otherwise. Then, for n>=1, a(n-1)=(-1)^n*charpoly(A,2). - _Milan Janjic_, Jan 27 2010
